library(teal.modules.general)

app <- teal::init(
  data = teal.data::teal_data(IRIS = iris),
  modules = teal::modules(
    teal.modules.general::tm_data_table(
      label = "Data Explorer",
      datanames = "IRIS"
    )
  )
)

shiny_app <- shiny::shinyApp(app$ui, app$server)

if (interactive()) {
  shiny_app
} else {
  return(shiny_app)
}
